ygData.subject: Re: AC Dilemma
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a Lambent Stone yesterday for 30PP.  His original auction was for 100PP.  All you have to do is put them in thier place. =)  It also helps if you re the
ygData.messageBody:
I got a Lambent Stone yesterday for 30PP. His original auction was for
100PP. All you have to do is put them in thier place. =) It also helps if
you're the only Bard in the zone. I may take your suggestions and head to
Perma and Guk and see if I can get some looting rights =).

Alynae Shadowdancer
21St Song, Povar

-----Original Message-----
From: James C. French <condra@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, November 08, 1999 3:09 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] AC Dilemma


>From: "James C. French" <condra@...>
>
>I got lambert greves at 23. Use your invise song and hit guk and perma to
>get shin and icy greves respectively if you spend some time ~ 2 hour in
>both dungons for me you can reqest looting rights for the armor. As it is
>lore and heavy it is bad loot to most of the casters hunting there and thay
>willing let you loot and watch your back. Good luck to you you will need
110
>pp to by gems to do quest. Maybe another 100 pp if you buy your lambert.
>Lambert stones are acutiong around 100 pp ( i will not pay that im to
>cheep )
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Daniel P. Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
>To: EQ Bards <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Date: Monday, November 08, 1999 12:05 AM
>Subject: [eqbards] AC Dilemma
>
>
>>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>>
>> Call me indecisive - but money accumulates in my bank - cause I can
>never decide what to spend it on. I have in the neighborhood of 850pp.
I'm
>not too thrilled with my armor. Mostly some banded still a lot of barbed,
>etc. A few pieces of bronze. I'm at level 26 btw - so I'm almost at the
>point where I can think about questing for Lambent.
>>
>> But anyway - I got to the armor store in E Freeport and look at the
>Steel Plate. I notice that they mostly offer 1 or 2 AC points above the
>equivalent banded. Same as Bronze with a small weight saving. Question
>is - is it worth it? How important is one or two AC points? How important
>is 2 or 3 but giving up STR or whatever bonuses. I have Blackened Iron
>Shoulders. It says "Magic Item". What does this actually provide? Is the
>Steel Pauldron the equivalent? Pretty annoying you can't tell without
>buying and then you can sell it at a fraction of what you pay for it if you
>make a mistake (obviously forcing you to check website like EQualizer...
>>
>> Anyone have any other suggestions on what to spend money on? For
weaps
>I'm using Dirk and Barbed Leather Whip.
>>
>>Thanks!
>>
>>Slyde
>>
>>
>>[Attachments have been removed from this message]
>>
>>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
>with the subject lol.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
